AcademicSession.name: AcademicSession
AcademicSession.description: Records course offering period. Specifies time periods based on an institution’s calendar whether that is semesters, quarters, trimesters, or other terms.

AcademicTermId.description: The Academic Term associated with the Academic Session.

AddDropDeadline.description: The last date when a student can add or drop a course, without a record of registration on their academic period.

AuditDueDate.description: The last date for a student to audit a course and take it without seeking a grade or credit.

ClassEndDate.description: The date when classes end for the Academic Session.

ClassStartDate.description: The date when classes start for the Academic Session.

CourseWithdrawDeadline.description: The date when withdraw from a course is recorded on the student’s academic record.

Description.description: The description of the Academic Session.

ExamEndDate.description: The date when exams for the Academic Session end.

ExamStartDate.description: The date when exams for the Academic Session start.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Academic Session is active (true) or not (false).

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ResultAvailabilityDate.description: The date when the result of the course offering is announced.

ResultDueDate.description: The last date to submit the result of a course offering, such as grades.

Season.description: Specifies the season related to the Academic Session.

Type.description: Specifies the type of Academic Session.
